name: Breakout Mastery
description:
Controls

"A" and "D" moves the paddle Left and Right

"Spacebar" launches your ball

"R" will restart the level.

Level 1: "Rodent"

 While beating the game's only level is entirely possible, perfecting your score will be no easy task...

Can you defeat the Rodent?

Some extra controls:

"K" will change swap the colors once in-game.

---

PS.

I was going to add a whole set of features, but I got so caught up playing the game that I ran out of time... 

If you beat my high-score I will release the next update!

Also: You can have more than one ball in the air at once!
